chunks.text:
Good morning,

 

Let me please loop in the relevant stakeholder that shall support on the below:

 

*	ADMCC (police approval), inspection: By Group security. @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> 
*	ADCD attested AMC : By Facility management. @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  Application submitted and now with Ramzi for final signature.  
*	Hassantuk installation / completion certificate : By Government Affairs / Admin. @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com>  Tomorrow 04/07/2025 at 8:30 AM.
*	Fitness certificate : By Government Affairs / Admin. @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com>  This after receiving AMC & after Hassantuk installation. 
*	Public insurance : By Admin team. @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 
*	Pest control AMC : By Admin team @Pierre BAA SOLO <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com> 

 

Dear @stakeholder,

 

Appreciate your usual support, update and share above mandatory documents at the earliest.

 

Looking forward to your prompt responses.

 

Best regards,

 

 

MOHAMED BATA

SPECIALIST ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

ABU DHABI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000

+971508158454

Sent: Thursday, 19 June 2025 7:06 PM
To: Eric Vergnes <Eric.Vergnes@chalhoub.com <mailto:Eric.Vergnes@chalhoub.com> >; Romy Ammar <Romy.Ammar@chalhoub.com <mailto:Romy.Ammar@chalhoub.com> >; Mohamed BATA <Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com> >

Subject: RE: Repossi - Galleria, AUH - Handover at RISK

 

Dear Eric, 

 

Greetings, hope you are doing great.

 

Since we are just one week away to the handover date of 26.06.2025, there is a delay in receiving the following documentations, which makes the handover date very critical.

 

Note: From receiving the below listed documents, we need 7 – 10 working days to do our final ADCD inspection request, inspection, completion certificate and to handover the store.

 

Appreciate your support in expediting these documents.,

Note: From receiving the below listed documents, we need 7 – 10 working days to do our final ADCD inspection request, inspection, completion certificate and to handover the store.

 

Appreciate your support in expediting these documents.,

 

Pending Client documents:

*	ADMCC (police approval), inspection: By Group security.
*	ADCD attested AMC : By Facility management.
*	Hassantuk installation / completion certificate : By Government Affairs / Admin.
*	Fitness certificate : By Government Affairs / Admin.
*	Public insurance : By Admin team.
*	Pest control AMC : By Admin team

 

Kindly revert for any clarifications.

 

Thanks & Regards

Dear All,

 

Please find attached this week’s PPR for your records.

 

We are currently targeting 26.06.26 as the HO date. However, please note that we are still awaiting the AMC, safety certificates, and Hassantuk, all of which are required to proceed with the final authority inspections.

Any delays in receiving these may impact the planned HO timeline. Additional details are provided in the Risk Section of the attached report.

 

Best Regards,

 

 

celine abikhalil

chunks.text:
With 90% of the work now complete, and final finishes to be executed upon receipt of the pending documents, we would like to schedule a pre-handover site meeting. Kindly advise us of your availability in the coming days so we can coordinate accordingly.

 

Also, please refer to the Risk section (notes marked in red) within the attached PPR. This highlights the inspection tracking process, which will happen upon receipt of the TL and ADGM documentation. Your updates on this matter would be appreciated, as we need clarity on where we stand in the process. 

 

Best regards,

 

 

 

celine abikhalil​​​​

Dear all,

 

Please find attached last week’s PPR for your records.

 

As of now, we have achieved 80% completion of construction work on-site. We are targeting final completion by 20 March 2025, with the exception of carpet installation, loose furniture, and final painting. These elements will remain on hold until we receive the pending documents. For details on the pending documents and their impact on inspections, please refer to the notes in red on the first page of the attached PPR (under Risk).

chunks.text:
As of now, we have achieved 80% completion of construction work on-site. We are targeting final completion by 20 March 2025, with the exception of carpet installation, loose furniture, and final painting. These elements will remain on hold until we receive the pending documents. For details on the pending documents and their impact on inspections, please refer to the notes in red on the first page of the attached PPR (under Risk).

 

Additionally, while the cameras have been installed, SIRA approval requires TL and ADGM certification of lease. Once we receive the necessary documents, please note that we will need six weeks for the handover process.

 

Best Regards,

 

 

 

celine abikhalil​​​​
